name: Joshua C. Agarrado
text: kung ayaw mo bumili ng bagong mouse, try AutoHotkey ( http://www.autohotkey.com/ ), pwede kang gumawa ng script parang "if interval between clicks < 10ms, ignore second click"

source_obj.text: kung ayaw mo bumili ng bagong mouse, try AutoHotkey ( http://www.autohotkey.com/ ), pwede kang gumawa ng script parang "if interval between clicks < 10ms, ignore second click"
